description: You can use https://json-schema-faker.js.org/ to generate sample json structures. Check option alwaysFakeOptionals. Unckeck option fillProperties

repos.description: List of repos that implement part of de API defined in this repo

urls.description: List of alternative repo URLs. A repo can be mirrored in multiple sites, or exist only in one remote.

paths.description: Path list that implement the API described here. It can be files or directories.

path.description: Path of source code implementation of API. Relative paths referenced to parent directory project root.

srcrev.description: git commit hash that the source repo must match in order to pass pre-push git hook QC
